ComicInfo.Title: The Golden Eyes; Old Trees Never Die; The Trouble with Emma; On Canvas
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Golden Eyes: The cruel Count Sforda terrorizes everyone, including his wife Renata. With the help of a sculptor, she decides to murder him. But will she be delivered from his stern gaze?
Old Trees Never Die: Rich man Mercer wants to chop down the dead tree that comes with his newly-bought estate. But will the tree allow him to chop it down?
The Trouble with Emma: Recently-deceased Emma does not want to give up the company of brother Wilbur and sister-in-law Janet.
On Canvas: Art historian Bynner makes a fine living making forgeries of paintings by the great Vasquez. Until Vasquez decides to stop his career.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:29:45. [CVDB186099] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:44:55. [Issue ID 26623]
